content: IVML > People > Stefanos Kollias IVML - index about | r&d | publications | courses | people | links Stefanos Kollias Contact Details Personal Data Studies Positions Research Interests Educational and Research Activities Other Related Activities Contact Details E-mail stefanos@cs.ntua.gr Tel +30 210 772 2488 Fax +30 210 772 2492 top Personal Data Place / Year of birth 1956 / Athens Marital Status Married, 2 children top Studies 1984 Ph.D in Signal Processing, Computer Science Division, National Technical University of Athens 1982 COMSOC Scholarship from the IEEE Communication Society 1980 M.Sc. in Communication Engineering, Institute of Science and Technology, University of Manchester 1979 Diploma in Electrical Engineering, National Technical University of Athens 1974 Honorary Diploma in the Annual Panhellenic Competition in Mathematics top Positions 1997- Full Professor of National Technical University of Athens and Director of the Image, Video and Multimedia Systems Lab. 1986-1997 Associate Professor, Assistant Professor and Lecturer of National Technical University of Athens 1987-1988 Visiting Research Scientist, Department of Electrical Engineering and Center for Telecommunications Research, Columbia University top Research Interests Image and ideo processing, analysis, coding, storage, retrieval, multimedia systems, computer graphics and virtual reality, artificial intelligence, neural networks, human computer interaction, medical imaging. top Educational and Research Activities Fifteen graduate students have completed their Doctorate under his supervision. Fourteen more are currently performing their Ph.D. More than 240 published papers, 80 of which in international journals. Most of them can be found here. The last few years he and his team have been leading or participating in forty five projects, both European and National. top Other Related Activities Reviewer of more than 20 International Journals. Reviewer of the Greek Secretariat of Research and Technology since 1989. Reviewer of the European Commission since 1996, in the Telematics, Esprit and IST Programme. Invited expert in the Vision2012 Workshop of the EU in the field of Knowledge Technologies and Interfaces in June 23-24, 2002. Member of the Executive Committee of the European Neural Network Society and of the European Neural Network Council, 1991 - 1992. Member of the Executive Committee of the EU Network of Excellence NEURONET (1994 - 2000) of the ESPRIT Programme, as a Managing Node for Greece. Member of the Énternational Advisory or Technical Committee in 40 International Conferences in Image Analysis, in Neural Networks and in Human Computer Interaction. Organised the VLBV01 International Workshop on Multimedia Analysis in October 2001 in Athens. Presented more than 40 Invited Papers in International Conferences. top © 02 The Image, Video and Multimedia Systems Laboratory - v1.05
